de.hdu.pvs.crashfinder.analysis

Class Slicing

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hdu.pvs.crashfinder.analysis.Slicing

  • public class Slicing
extends Object
    This file computes a slice and also maps the result to source code. For creating a launcher, See the 'PDFSlice' launcher included in the 'launchers' directory in WALA.
    Author:
    Mohammad Ghanavati date: 05.05.2013
    See Also:
    Slicer, PDFSlicer and SlicerTest from WALA
